features: PROVIDE SUPPORT: Most wheelchairs lack support and their flimsy seat and back isn't designed to help maintain good posture. Our ergonomically contoured cushions align your lower back in its natural position and take pressure off your spine and tailbone.

PROVIDE COMFORT: Your will feel much better about your wheelchair if it is comfortable. Our cushions provide support but are also soft enough to feel good to sit on. Turn your thoughts to greener pastures than your aching back and bottom.

2-PIECE COMBO SYNERGISTIC EFFECT: The seat cushion supports the hips and tailbone, and the lumbar pillow supports the back. These cushions complement each other and provide more support and comfort than a seat cushion or a lumbar cushion alone ever could.

THOROUGHLY RESEARCHED AND TESTED: Look no further for the perfect wheelchair cushions! This cushion set is the result of thorough research into wheelchair users' needs, followed by relentless testing with hundreds of wheelchair users.

GOOD POSTURE PREVENTS PAIN: Sitting straighter helps reduce chronic body aches, which get in the way of an active lifestyle and affect your mood. Simply turn your wheelchair into a comfortable one which takes care of your posture for you.

WATERPROOF COVER: The Bottom Cushion's cover stops fluids from seeping into and soiling the memory foam within. If you need to wash the cover, simply take it off and toss it in the washing machine. Do NOT wash the memory foam. The Lumbar Cushion is NOT waterproof.
A WONDERFUL GIFT: Don’t get your loved ones anything but the best. There are few things you can buy a wheelchair user that will make them happier than long-term comfort and pain relief.

EASY RETURNS: Our cushions have changed lives, but if they don’t change yours please return them and we'll refund you in full. Best to try them for at least a week since it might take a while for your body to get used to them.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Lumbar Pillow Provides Support For The Back. The Ergonomic Shape Of The Cushion Helps To Keep The Spine Straight
The Seat Cushion Protects The Tailbone, Keeps The Pelvis Rotated For A Straight Back And Holds You Steady In The Wheelchair
Hear What Our Customers Have To Say About These Cushions

Seat Cushion & Lumbar Pillow Features 4" Thick Superior Memory Foam We use the best memory foam, and you can tell the difference. Our cushions maintain their shape over time but mould to your body when you're sitting on them. Waterproof & Machine-Washable The cover of the bottom cushion is waterproof, so the memory foam inside won't get soiled. Simply remove the cover off the memory foam core by unzipping it, then toss it in the laundry when it's dirty. Wash only with cold water and air dry. Developed For Wheelchair Users We researched the needs of wheelchair users, and designed and thoroughly tested our lumbar and seat cushions together to best help correct posture issues of wheelchair users.
Stuck On Finding A Meaningful Gift?

Wheelchair Cushion Set Q&A Why does my back hurt? While there are many causes of back pain, the most common is wrong posture. Most backaches can be prevented or cured with the correct sitting position. Even the back pain felt in bed can be traced back to incorrect posture during the day. How do these cushions help? Our cushions helps you sit straight with your back aligned, preventing slouching of the back or anterior tilting of the pelvis which most commonly lead to back pain. With these cushions, you won't have to constantly think about correcting your posture—they do the work for you. Are 2 cushions better than 1? Our cushions complement each other. The Seat Cushion (the one you sit on) helps distribute the weight evenly over the buttocks and prevents chronic tailbone pain. It also encourages the right amount of pelvic tilt to keep the spine straight. The Lumbar Cushion also keeps the spine straight, providing support and comfort to your back. Are the cushions hard or soft? The cushions are hard enough to provide support and maintain their shape, but soft enough to be amazingly comfortable. Can I wash these cushions? The cushions are enclosed in a machine-washable cover, which can be easily removed by opening the zippers on each cushion. Always wash with cold water and air dry. The memory foam core itself should never be washed. Are these cushions waterproof? The cover of the Seat Cushion is waterproof, meaning it won't let fluids sink into the memory foam inside. The Lumbar Cushion is not waterproof – it does not need to be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sitting in a wheelchair for a long time can be uncomfortable
reviews.reviewText: My husband is 80 and recently had 3+ months going through surgeries and time in a Rehab facility. He found that when he had to be in his wheelchair for long, his rear and back would ached and sometimes even hurt. the usual cushions just didn't do enough. I went on Amazon to find a better cushion. This one seemed to offer the most comfort. The nurse he had at Rehab said it was the Cadillac of cushions! When he had to endure long rides in the transport ambulance to the hospital, he would be uncomfortable by the time he arrived. Traveling around the hospital in the chair in addition was very hard for him to endure. When we got the cushion, he said it was such a relief. Of course, he would rather not have to be in a wheelchair at all, but until he is fully recovered, it is a marvel. I can take him to his doctors appointments without worrying about his comfort. This cushion comes with a back cushion also which is such a comfort for his back. He gave 5 stars on this!

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Value for Cost
reviews.reviewText: They fit well, and are reasonably padded. Vinyl covers start cracking after a year of heavy use, but for the price that's not bad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my friend who is in a wheelchair. She immediately exclaimed how comfortable the seat was. She didn't mention the back pillow but she didn't complain either! I know she was really pleased to receive them and have given her much comfort and support.

reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my electric wheelchair. Both the seat cushion and the lumbar back cushions are very soft and comfortable and they don't slide around at all. They stay in place. I'm completely satisfied and am very happy with this purchase.
